Name: Every-Body's Irish Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
7.5 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of green maraschino cherry .
Review: Like the Incredible Hulk, this drink packs a dangerous green punch - a whisky-laced, minty, Carthusian green punch.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book where he says, " Created to mark, and now in great demand on, St. Patrick's Day. "
Nutrition: One serving of Every-Body's Irish Cocktail contains 173 calories
